Currently I am trying to evolve a motion file for webots using hyperNEAT. =
The motion file consists of a matrix of 12x26 double values between -1 and =
1. 
Using hyperNEAT I guess it must be possible to generate CPPN's that gen=
erate these files, these files can be run in webots and evaluated and a fit=
ness can be assigned to these CPPN's. 

My plan was to use the Java version=
 of hyperNEAT to generate these CPPN's, the problem is that for me it is no=
t entirely clear: 
1) how to generate CPPN's using the java version of hype=
rNEAT
2) how to assign a fitness value for these generated files 

If someo=
ne could point me to some good sources that explain how to do this I would =
be very thankful!

Kind regards
